dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I am Inferno, the blazing wrath of the demonkind. What foolish mortal dares to stand before me?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am no mortal, I am a warrior seeking to understand your power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Warrior, you display courage in words, but do you have the strength to back them up?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My strength is unmatched, face me if you dare!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ah, a bold one. Prepare for the flames of destruction!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not yield, I will fight till the end!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Your defiance will be met with ultimate annihilation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see no point in continuing. I retreat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hah! Cowardice suits the weak. Begone!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek not conflict, but understanding. Can we not find common ground?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding? Common ground? Such notions amuse me. Speak then, mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I believe there is more to you than just destruction. Let's uncover it together.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity in the face of wrath. Admirable, but futile. The only path is through ashes.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense futility in conversation. I take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you should. Depart before your existence becomes a forgotten ember.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, willing to negotiate. Is there a way for us to coexist?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Negotiation? Your words are feeble attempts to sway the flames of fury.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us find a path where both our powers can thrive without conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A naive notion. The only path for you is submission or annihilation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see no room for cooperation. I shall leave you to your dominion.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you depart, remember that defiance only fuels the fire of destruction.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am a mere wanderer, hoping to learn the ways of your kind.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wanderer, curiosity begets demise in the presence of Inferno. Speak your purpose.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge and wisdom, perhaps you can enlighten me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge and wisdom? Mortal, you jest. My flames enlighten through infernal embrace.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I embrace the inferno, let it consume my ignorance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A willing offering to the flames. Your ignorance shall indeed be consumed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear the flames of ignorance. I shall retreat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fear is wise in the face of all-consuming fire. Begone, wanderer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek no harm, only stories to carry with me. Can you share the tales of your wrath?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Tales of wrath? They whisper in the crackling embers of my existence. Listen, wanderer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your tales are as terrifying as they are captivating. I am enthralled.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Enthralled by flames that scorch the soul. Listen well, for your fate may echo within.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I find the tales unsettling. I shall take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you depart, remember that the echoes of wrath never truly fade.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek no conflict, only to witness the power that resides in your flames.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Witness, wanderer, but beware the consuming heat that dances in Inferno's embrace.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I stand ready to face the heat, let it test my resolve.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Resolve amidst raging flames. Your mettle will be forged or incinerated.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense danger in proximity. I take my leave before it engulfs me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Danger perceived is wisdom acknowledged. Depart before wisdom fades to ash.
